energy.usef.core.workflow.coordinator

Class AbstractSettlementCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.workflow.coordinator.AbstractSettlementCoordinator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgrInitiateSettlementCoordinator, BrpInitiateSettlementCoordinator, DsoInitiateSettlementCoordinator

    public abstract class AbstractSettlementCoordinator
extends Object
    Abstract implementation of a SettlementCoordinator implementing shared methods.

      • invokeInitiateSettlementPbc

        public SettlementDto invokeInitiateSettlementPbc(WorkflowContext inContext)
        Invokes the Pluggable Business Component in charge of the initialization of the settlement. Outcoming workflow context will be validated and settlement items will be save in the database.
        Parameters:
        inContext - WorkflowContext input context.

      • calculateSettlementPrice

        public SettlementDto calculateSettlementPrice(SettlementDto settlementDto,
                                              List<FlexOfferDto> flexOfferDtos)
        Computes pro-rate settlement prices for all flex orders where not all ordered power is delivered based on the calculation:

        PTU-Settlement.Price = DeliveredFlexPower * (FlexOrder.Price / OrderedFlexPower)

        Parameters:
        settlementDto - The SettlementDto containing the settlement info needed to do the calculations.
        flexOfferDtos - List of FlexOfferDto objects containing the ordered flex.
        Returns:
        SettlementDto with updated prices
